Detailed Description

Functions to join images and auxiliary actions

Function Documentation

void ChangeBaseDistortionParameters (  CvMat **  intrMatrix,
CvMat **  distCoeffs,
int  cp[8]
) 
 

Readjust base distortion parameters.

Parameters:
intrMatrix container to pointer to intrinsic matrix not previously allocated
distCoeffs container to pointer to distortion coefficients not previsouly allocated
cp Array of 8 ints with numbers between 0 and 100% where 50% is the default. If NULL default values are used. The order of params is fx, fy, cx, cy, k1, k2, k3, k4

IplImage* joinImages (  IplImage *  img1,
IplImage *  img2,
IplImage *  img3,
int  hOver,
int  bin,
void(*  binOper)(const CvArr *, const CvArr *, CvArr *, const CvArr *)
) 
 

Join two images with a given overlapping region.

Parameters:
img1 Left image (type IplImage*)
img2 Right image (type IplImage*). Must be the same size of img1
img3 Allocated space for joint image (type IplImage*). Must be two times the width of img1.
hOver Integer with overlaping dimension (when made negative the fusion image is centered in the joint image frame)
bin Output binary images with threshold bin, or 0 for no thresholding
binOper open CV function to process binary images (cvOr, cvAnd) NULL uses cvOR
Returns:
Pointer to joint image or NULL on error

IplImage* UndistortImage (  IplImage *  img1,
IplImage *  img2,
int  cp[8],
CvMat **  mapx,
CvMat **  mapy
) 
 

Undistort an image using default or passed parameters.

Parameters:
img1 Original image (type IplImage*)
img2 Undistorted image (type IplImage*) and must have allocated space. Must be the same size of img1. If NULL, initial calculations are done according to parameter mats (below)
cp Array of 8 ints with numbers between 0 and 100% where 50% is the default. If NULL default values are used. The order of params is fx, fy, cx, cy, k1, k2, k3, k4
mapx address of pointer to mapx. If NULL content uses default undistort on each call.
mapy address of pointer to mapx. If NULL content uses default undistort on each call.
Returns:
Pointer to joint image or NULL on error
